basics.name: Aaren Orquia
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: A web application to help electricians to quickly and easily create cable schedules for their projects | JavaScript, Meteor, MongoDB, React
highlights: Companies can create projects that electricians can view to create cable schedules.
Application uses roles (only certain roles have access to some features).

work.summary: A database that stores user information (records) into a file that can be edited | C++ |
highlights: The program opens with a user interface asking what the user would like to do, add, remove or read a record.
Based on the user's choice, the program will complete it. The file storing the records changes if the user adds or removes a record.
The database is saved every time a user quits the program or changes the database.

work.summary: A Sudoku solver that can solve any sudoku problem | Java |
highlights: The program is given three 3x3 matrices with some missing values.
The goal of the sudoku solver is to fill the 9x9 square with numbers 1-9 with no repeating numbers in each line, horizontally, vertically and in the same 3x3.
The algorithm uses recursion to find possible values, plugging them in recursively until all three conditions are met.
Competed in the Mountain Pacific Sports Federation (MPSF) championships
Finished 5th in the 100 yard butterfly at the UNLV and Wyoming Tri-meet

awards.title: MVP Award: Men's Swimming
